pullrequest.title: Correct the calculation of AABB transformations and give frame semantics to AABB types

content.raw:
From: https://www.gamasutra.com/view/feature/131833/when_two_hearts_collide_.php?print=1, I think we could also use the extremities of the OOBB to compute the minimal AABB.

" it’s possible to transform only those extreme points by the current orientation and get a new bounding box. In other words, I can take the vertices of the object’s OBB and use the maximum and minimum of those positions to create a new AABB"
